div.p: This code system http://fhir.ch/ig/ch-crl/CodeSystem/nkrs-msuffixofpt defines the following codes:

description.value:
The data item records the unspecified multiplicity of multiple primary tumours at a single site.
**m-Suffix of pT (Variable number: 4.9)** in \'NATIONAL CANCER DATA DICTIONARY, V 1.1, Part A, BASIC VARIABLES for Adults, Adolescents, and Children (23.12.2019)\' ([EN](https://www.nacr.ch/assets/files/uploads/a-datadictionary-basicvariables-v1.1.pdf), [DE](https://www.nkrs.ch/assets/files/uploads/a-datenstruktur-variablen-der-basisdaten-v1.1.pdf), [FR](https://www.onec.ch/assets/files/uploads/a-dict-des-donnees-variables-de-base-v1.1.pdf), [IT](https://www.snrt.ch/assets/files/uploads/a-dati-oncologici-variabili-di-base-v1.1.pdf))
